ui.viralTitle: Want to measure your steel mentality?
ui.viralSub: Scan QR code to start test

guide.purpose: This test measures your 'resilience', analyzing how quickly you recover and adapt in adversity and stressful situations.
guide.instruction: Read each statement and select the option that best matches your usual thinking. Honest answers will provide a more accurate profile.
guide.interpretation: Results are shown as a resilience index. This shows how flexibly you can cope and grow in crisis situations.

items.text: I can move toward my goals even in difficult situations.
When stressed, my concentration actually increases.
I recover quickly from failure and try again.
In crisis situations, I calmly try to find solutions.
I accept and adapt to change positively.
When unexpected problems arise, I easily panic and break down.
I believe difficult experiences make me stronger.
Once I fail, I don't have the courage to try again.
I believe in my own strengths and can use them.
Even in tough times, I don't lose hope and find positive aspects.

R.high: You have a strong mentality that recovers quickly and grows even in adversity. You excel at turning difficulties into opportunities.
R.low: It may take time to recover in stressful or failure situations. Mental strengthening training and positive thinking practice can be helpful.
